org.pac4j.openid.client
Class MyOpenIdClient

java.lang.Object
  org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableObject
      org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<OpenIdCredentials,U>
          org.pac4j.openid.client.BaseOpenIdClient<MyOpenIdProfile>
              org.pac4j.openid.client.MyOpenIdClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Client<OpenIdCredentials,MyOpenIdProfile>
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class MyOpenIdClient
extends BaseOpenIdClient<MyOpenIdProfile>

This class is the OpenID client to authenticate users in myopenid.com. The service will end on Februray 1, 2014.

The user used for the redirection to myopenid.com must be defined in the request parameter named DEFAULT_USER_PARAMETER_NAME (by default) or the name given through the setUserParameterName(String) method.

It returns a MyOpenIdProfile.

Since:
1.4.0
Author:
Jerome Leleu
See Also:
MyOpenIdProfile
